name: Crafted_Devastation_E
display_help: Enhances the accuracy of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}%, damage by {Boost.Attrib.Damage.Scale}%, reduces endurance cost by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}% and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}%.
power_short_helps: Enhances Accuracy and Damage, Increases Attack Rate, and Reduces Endurance Cost
